name: SHAMSHON EPIC
description:
Inspired by a bootleg Android game. Take the role of the world-famous children's icon ShamShon. Features heavily revamped graphics and gameplay (not that that was a high bar to hit in the first place)! A constantly-rising 3D background, more intuitive mechanics, three selectable background songs... it's all here! Can you eat the burger?

CONTROLS:

All three mouse buttons - Everything. Use this to your advantage!
